name: Typical Monday at Ludwig's
description:
Help Ludwig navigate through another dreadful Monday, featuring Coots (and Ders?).

ControlActionArrow keysMovementXMelee AttackSpaceDashCHit the Luddy

Solo dev. Phased boss fight against Coots. Started pretty late so definitely could use more work. SFX in particular is lacking and quite noticeable. It's my first jam so definitely made lots of mistakes in the development stage, probably spent too much time making assets and designing instead of prototyping and polishing.  Hope you enjoy. Have fun!
